titles.title: To authorize the use of certain contributed funds for activities relating to operational documents for non-Federal reservoirs, and for other purposes.
Non-Federal Reservoir Operations Improvement Act
Non-Federal Reservoir Operations Improvement Act
Non-Federal Reservoir Operations Improvement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary:
Non-Federal Reservoir Operations Improvement Act
This bill authorizes the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers to receive and expend funds from an owner of a nonfederal reservoir to formulate, review, or revise reservoir operational documents. The reservoir must have been constructed at least in part with federal funds provided for the use of storage for flood risk management or navigation.
